p.span: Hello and Welcome to the Maywood Public Schools. Our two schools, Memorial School (grades Pre-K - 3) and Maywood Avenue School (grades 4-8), take pride in providing students with a challenging learning environment that fosters the unique potential of each child and nurtures a respect and appreciation for the individuality of all students. Our goal is to prepare our students to be responsible, successful, ethical members of society. The Maywood School District is proud of its schools and invites and encourages parent involvement to support our efforts.
